title: Differentiator: Initiative Recommendation and Tracking
content: This is an effort that is best built on a solid and foundation of rich data analytics and reporting and that is fundamental to continued differentiation of the COA offering. This represents the largest and most significant effort of building COA and would require the engagement of numerous subject matter experts.  To most effectively develop this, a broad library of use cases, reports and composites are needed as a foundational element.
